title: 3 and Out - Rookie QB's, Urban's NFL Transition, Tua Pressure, Hurry Up NFL Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Rookie QB's, Urban's NFL Transition, Tua Pressure, Hurry Up NFL Headlines, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John analyzes the different situations the rookie QB's are in, which should start or sit in week 1, what factors are working against Urban Meyer as he transitions to the NFL. He also gives his quick takes on the other top NFL headlines from the week, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
